price: Sε Yεsoma mframa (a εsεe wͻn mfudeε no), na wͻhunu sε (wͻn mfudeε no) aboto wͻ akyire yi (a nsupa tͻ maa wͻn mfudeε yεε fεfεεfε no a) wͻyi boniayε.
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رِيحٗا فَرَأَوۡهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا لَّظَلُّواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wala-in arsalnā rīḥan fara-awhu muṣ'farran laẓallū min baʿdihi yakfurūna
